website_summaries.verdict: A charming and attractive tissue box cover that's both handmade and hand painted.
pros: Stands out for its unusual design
This is a good-looking accessory that's also functional
Features sturdy construction and careful hand decorating
The golden edging to the books is a nice touch
cons: Many big brand boxes don't fit inside

customer_reviews.title: Quick tip for inserting box
customer_reviews.text: Product is not perfect, as other have pointed out. Especially, about a standard tissue box fitting inside. Quick Tip: Just cut out the ends of the box with good scissors, and cut the front of the box length wise. Value for the money this is a great product and looks stupendous next to a standard tissue box. Please let me know if this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Islandtime Rick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box .... works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box is perfect! Matches my decor perfectly. Yes, the original Kleenex paper box does not fit but who cares. Open up the Kleenex box remove the tissues and put them directly in your new container. It's exactly what I wanted! Great wood and sturdy box, well crafted and painted. Colors are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T.

customer_reviews.title: Very clever design
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, you cannot find rectangular tissue holders in stores anymore, and I don't like the look of the odd-colored cardboard tissue boxes in my rooms. I was delighted to find many on Amazon, and thought this one was especially clever for my den. It's well-constructed and holds a 160-count box of Kleenex with no problems (I'm not sure why other reviewers are having trouble with the tissue boxes). The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that I did find the gold paint used on the "pages" of the "books" to be a little glitzier than I would've liked.
customer_reviews.author: CozyCritic

customer_reviews.title: The product looks GREAT, but it is too small to hold a ...
customer_reviews.text: The product looks GREAT, but it is too small to hold a typical size tissue box. You can't just put the tissues in without the box as the tissues don't dispense properly without the top of the cardboard tissue box. I had to cut the cardboard tissue box to fit. If this was just a little larger, this would be a 5 STAR product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolann K.

customer_reviews.title: Tissue box doesn't fit inside.
customer_reviews.text: It's really pretty, but it doesn't fit a standard size tissue box inside. I had to take the tissues out of their original packaging. How inconvenient!
customer_reviews.author: tavin

customer_reviews.title: Classic Tissue Holder!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and it’s much nicer in person! I love the way the books are made and the lid opens easily to place box of tissue inside. Mine fit perfectly! I have allergies, so always need tissue nearby. So this looks much nicer in my living room. The colors match well with my decor. I appreciate the way the wood is cut to look like the pages of a book and painted a nice gold shade. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Chappy

customer_reviews.title: The size fits a kleenex box in it nicely, and it looks just amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, but I returned it because it came ruined on the edges. I usually ask for a replacement, but I didn't want to risk so close to the holidays. The size fits a kleenex box in it nicely, and it looks just amazing! You need to pay attention for scratches, and ask for a replacement. Great gift otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia

customer_reviews.title: Big box
customer_reviews.text: this box was huge, so big that I returned it. The other disappointment was the lid didn't close all the way down over the box. the box was a smidge too tall. It was wonderfully painted but too big for a side table top. It needs to be on a large table or counter.
customer_reviews.author: Maieee

customer_reviews.title: Arrived poorly packaged and broken
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a nice concept. Read the mixed reviews, decided to take a chance. It arrived with the lid hinges pulled out and a screw missing. The screws were TINY -- no wonder they pulled out. The holes had been drilled twice as well. The finish was also inconsistent -- very poor in places. As mentioned in other reviews, the opening in the top is so large a lot of the box you are trying to hide actually shows. One positive -- our tissue box did fit inside so the issue of it not fitting appears to have been corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tissue holder!
customer_reviews.text: I had one this size years ago and a student knocked it off my desk accidently and the lid split. I bought another but it was much smaller and would not hold the box and tissues. I saw this and noted the dimensions and it DOES fit the box and tissues inside! I also get compliments on how it looks so nice and some have believed it was a stack of real books!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: The top does not come assembled
customer_reviews.text: Great looking decor but the top was not assembled to the box and the screws are so very tiny, we could not put it together so the top is just laying on the box which completely affects its function as a kleenex box. I have put another decorative book on top of it, but I wasn't able to use it as I thought. You better have a magnifying glass and a very tiny Phillips screwdriver before trying to assemble this little bugger.
customer_reviews.author: Ladydi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Picky Parent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my bookworm father as a Father's Day gift. He's usually very hard to buy for, but he loves this. My mother came across this tissue box in the evening, and it's realistic-looking enough that she tried to pick the books up to look at them. She was confused as to why they were all stuck together before she realized that it was a decorative box. It's sturdy and painted beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: EOLS

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a tissue box with class, this is it. We have ours in the bedroom on the night table, but it would look just as good in the family room or even a formal living room; anywhere really. I read another review that said tissue boxes won't fit, and you have to put the tissue in by itself. While it's true that regular size boxes are too tall, I just bought the smaller size boxes and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: kkalico

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: While this tissue holder is attractive, it is too small for a large box of tissue. Also, one tissue at a time does not come out. They come out in gobs. I had to cut the bottom off a box and put it in - on top of the tissue to get one at a time and to make "almost" a whole box fit. I am forced to only buy Kleenex since they make a smaller box. I prefer the larger boxes. I would not buy it again. I will put this in our guest bath and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It looks wonderful! This is the prefect way to make a set of tissues non-abrasive aesthetically. I gave this to my brother for Christmas because it perfectly fits his living room decor and he always has allergies. The only con is that the tissues had to be placed in this box by themselves, which is really a non-issue in my opinion. I just couldn't get a box of tissues to fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Beats a crappy looking tissue box.
customer_reviews.text: Beats a crappy looking tissue box. I did not make the modification with plastic to hold the tissues up out of the box, so it just looks like some old books stacked up. Page edges not too realistic looking though. I deducted one star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done.
customer_reviews.text: Adds a certain tone to the room... and keeps the dog from tearing up the Kleenex box. Funny enough, it's made for really LARGE boxes.
customer_reviews.author: nikki lorel

customer_reviews.title: Watch what you but!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a tissue box.....the wood was beautiful, but it was misrepresented when I was searching for “tissue” boxes. There was NO way to put ANY tissues or napkins in that box. I gave it to Goodwill .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Books Kleenex Box
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Kleenex holder on my desk! My husband thought it was real books when he first looked at it from across the room. I was happy when I saw that It holds a large box of Kleenex. My old one only held a small box. It is well made and just as cute as it is in the picture. It is also easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect decorative box to hold tissues. (ESP if you love books!)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tissue box. It’s decorative and well made. I use bamboo reusable paper towels (cut into 4ths) as tissues so I just wanted a pretty tissue box for them. I love books - so this one caught my eye. I thought it was going to be a cheap plastic thing. Nope! It’s wooden with a hinge top. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy enough to hold the tissue box in place, which is what I wanted. It only gets 4 stars because the hinges were broken when it arrived and I had to reattach them. Also, the "lid" opens the wrong way. Why in the world would it not open like the cover of the books?! It is on my desk at school, and my students think it is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very clever and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: This tissue holder is so clever and well done I couldn't resist getting this for my granddaughter for her bedroom in the new house her family is building. She is an avid reader and loves her books. So Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: So this is a wooden box not sure how to rate the softness or stretch, lol. The box is very nice but came to us with the cover hinges bent. We were able to reset the pins and it looks amazing in my sons room! We love it
customer_reviews.author: Life in the Raw

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Pastor for his Pastoral Anniversary. He is going to love it. It looks very elegant and great decor for a person that reads and study all the time such as my Pastor. The price was very reasonable. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leake

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Appearance, but It Stinks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hide a box of Kleenex from my two small dogs. They love to shred paper. It works great, but the Kleenex now stink. I'm thinking of spraying the interior with some clear spray to stop the smell.
customer_reviews.author: BronzeOwl

customer_reviews.title: 185 2-ply tissue box doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit 185 2-ply tissue boxes. Entire product is solid, hinges are sturdy, looks nice, and works perfectly with smaller tissue boxes.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: My only problem was the hole that tissues are dispensed is so big on top you see the Kleenex box through it
customer_reviews.author: MAJIKKEY

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This matches beautifully with a game table that I purchased on Amazon as well. It's easy to fill with a tissue box and is a pretty addition to the room. I love it. Iadded felt to the bo5 to make sure it wouldn't scratch my table.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: One of the lid hinges was broken (not attached). Also, the opening is quite large. My Kleenex wouldn't continually feed without the tension of a smaller slot. I tried it out and had to reach in the opening to get the next one. Because of this I didn't try to fix the lid and decided to send it back and not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for all of my writer/reader friends and they loved them! The quality is very good and it's a nice-looking piece that is useful at the same time. Great buy for the money. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Escapist Reader

customer_reviews.title: weird size
customer_reviews.text: This item is really nice but doesn't fit any type of tissue boxes that I could find. Would have been nice to know ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: debra reeg

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, very well made and attractive !
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a very long time I decided to purchase this tissue holder because it is very antique looking and fit perfectly in our home. The colors are so realistic and blend with all shades of both wood and fabrics. A standard size box of tissues fits perfectly without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: D KING

customer_reviews.title: School bus students approve
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my school bus. Was so excited to find one that not only looks like a stack of books, but one that has a bottom to it so I can Velcro it to my bus dash. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Stevens

customer_reviews.title: read the reviews, they are all true
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's cheesy art work, yes, it is an awkward fit for kleenex boxes, yes it doesn't close firmly. That said, it is so cute and adorable. I don't like the look of cardboard boxes of tissues.
customer_reviews.author: hopalong

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. Came broken
customer_reviews.text: The hinges on the box came completely broken! The top itself was in no way connected to the base of the box. The top was so messed up that whoever put in the package obviously knew it was broken & didn't care. What a slap in the face. Dont buy this piece of craft. It's def getting sent back.
customer_reviews.author: azrael

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This tissue box holder is lovely to look at! Fits standard size Kleenex box. Open top of "books " to place Kleenex box inside. Solid bottom so can be easily moved or carried. I'm going to add other matching items to this beautiful box! Looks even better than pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I expected but it still looks nice. One thing I don't like is the golden side of it which is light gold rather than vintage
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: Funky hinge.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my bookworm friend. The box itself it not damaged but the hinge that attached lid to the base on the right side was off. The screw that were used to attach the lid were either too short or they popped out. But nothing a trip to Ace hardware and some wood glue didn't fix. 😋
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; kleenex box fits fine
customer_reviews.text: I was fully prepared to have to take the tissues out of the box to get them to fit, but the kleenex box fit fine. Nicely made and looks great in my "library." Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: A box of 200 tissues (Walmart) fit inside, it looks great. Seems sturdy enough for facial tissues, I would not sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: D Allison

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and made well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute and cool Kleenex box holder. I bought one for my desk at work in the office and loved it so much that I bought another one for my home.
customer_reviews.author: D and P McGunigale

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Terrible - poor workmanship. The top was not attached - just laying on top. (It was supposed to be attached) paint inside of lid was a mess. Thank goodness I had it sent to myself as it was supposed to b a gift. Promptly returned
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Fits standard size tissue box
customer_reviews.text: Sceptical about buying after reading reviews. Don't hesitate. This is a beautiful look and fits to a normal size tissue box. Did NOT have to remove tissues. I've gotten many compliments in the short time I've owned. A bit pricey for what it is, but overall it's a decoration with a purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Is this kitschy? Who cares?!
customer_reviews.text: As an artsy bibliophile with an affinity for gold, I feel represented by this tissue holder. The actual tissue box doesn’t fit in it but here’s a pro-tip: if you take the whole mass of tissues from their box at once, they still pop out normally ;) love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Kendalle Aubra

customer_reviews.title: Two problems
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but there were two problems: 1) The color was so darker than image. You can see the actual color by other customer images 2) The open side were too big and showed most part of tissue from top.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Nikravan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun decorative tissue box. It adds a ton of charm. Be sure you have a rectangular tissue box so when it comes, you’re ready.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but you have to buy a certain size of Kleenex box. But it fits our purpose
customer_reviews.author: kellie rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality on quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks, feels, and even smells like it was hand carved and painted! I had to trim off the top .5”-1” on my Kleenex box to get it to fit but I am in love with this!! Might be something I get for a gift this Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: GmaL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Makes my average tissue box look stylish!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and durability of this product!! My office furniture is Dark Cherry and this fits in perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Watch the sizes there are several sizes that look the same; we measured, our Kleenex box so it fits perfect and it looks great. I was afraid it would look cheap or cheesy but it doesn’t at all. We love it and may buy another for a different room!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good color and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this box...holds the box of tissues just fine. Have another with cacti print in the r v.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mazias

customer_reviews.title: Quality Piece
customer_reviews.text: This was a little bigger than I anticipated but I was able to find a place for it on a side table in my library/office as I always seem to need a tissue. It's very classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these! They look so unique & I don't have the cheap Kleenex boxes sitting out anywhere anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Esmerelda

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Compliments
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift from my husband. Everyone who has noticed it on my side table has immediately complimented it. It's so cute and quirky!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but very goldish! Especially from inside! I was expecting more of a rustic look.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Love The Antique Tissue Box!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Tissue Faux Book Antique Box! I have a room divider, side table, canisters etc in the faux book look in my den room! So, this goes right along with the theme! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: Good looking box.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking tissue box. I did have to do a small repair on one the hinges. They went to the trouble of making a nice box, and then put a really cheap flimsy pair of hinges.
customer_reviews.author: sally of texas

customer_reviews.title: A great way to have tissue in the den
customer_reviews.text: A great way to have tissue in the den. The tissue boxes in stores are so ugly I hate to have them out but this wood tissue box is so cute and well made. I have gotten many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Give this a ten out of ten we use as center piece at a wedding with flowers. Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Krystal hawks

customer_reviews.title: Too shallow
customer_reviews.text: Product is well built in general, but it’s not deep enough to fit a normal box of tissues I had. It’s about a quarter of an inch too shallow so the top doesn’t close. There’s also no latch or magnet to help push it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bohn

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is much nicer than I expected it to be. I love it. It looks so nice on my office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rona Poole

customer_reviews.title: something a little different
customer_reviews.text: Neat concept. Mine had a little paint chipped. Still looks OK though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my tissue holder!! Fits my decor great and is funtctional.
customer_reviews.author: Ally B.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love how it looks and what, for me, it represents. My husband passed 6 months ago and he was an avid reader. The urn that holds his ashes, is a set of books that I found and the Kleenex holder was perfect in that way. The only negative, small boxes of Kleenex are a little too small and the larger ones are too large.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Practical, looks good and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Because this tissue holder looks nice you can use it in any room of your house.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: First tissue box holder that doesn't look like an old lady one.
customer_reviews.author: dishie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workmanship!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice piece, especially for such a great price! Really unique and it really dresses up wherever it is placed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jide's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this because of some reviews saying that it didn't fit standard sized tissue boxes, but mine is perfect! I've tried several brands and they all fit perfectly inside the holder. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but looks more like plastic
customer_reviews.text: It works for the purpose. Looks good with tissue in it. The only thing is the rim looks like cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I am so happy with how it classy it looks and how it looks in my guest room. Fit my Kleenex tissue box perfectly. Well worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Russ & Sandi Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for book lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Standard size facial tissue boxes are a bit big for this but shorter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Classy box.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking box. Will hold about one and a half boxes of Kleenex. I may buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Romeos mom

customer_reviews.title: love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, but the kleenex box didn't fit. If you cut off the top of the kleenex box, it fits just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peg R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tissue holder! I love books and this one looks like beautiful books. Perfect for a library. It is very sturdy and beautiful. The tissue box fits easily in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Neesey

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product ! I just wish that the open of the box was not so big. Bc u can see the tissue box. Otherwise it is beautiful product
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: What an attractive, nicely made tissue holder
customer_reviews.text: What an attractive, nicely made tissue holder. Looks nice in my bathroom. The box of tissues I have are in a big box so I just took the tissues out of the box and put them in the holder. Worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic!
customer_reviews.text: Fools everyone that walks into the library. Doesn’t look cheap or tacky. Easy open top to place tissue box in.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold the standard tissue box
customer_reviews.text: Holds the facial tissue, but not the standard box it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Meche in Okla

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, good fit and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Holds tissue box perfectly and adds some class to living room as opposed to bare tissue box. Well made and looks good for this person who likes to read.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia O.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect solution to hide a boring tissue box!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! Love how this blends seemlessly in my decor. The realistic book design really sold me! Tissue boxes are an eyesore and this perfect! Made of wood. Top lifts open to place a standard tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: Newindie2009

customer_reviews.title: Tissue box lids
customer_reviews.text: The screws are too small to hold the lid on. The lids were broken and I had to buy screws to reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is a pretty box.
customer_reviews.text: It was not complete when I got it. It came with 2 screws not inserted in top of box. I had a time screwing them in. However, it is a pretty box.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. I did too
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my friend.She is a bookworm. She loved it .I did too. I ordered one for me. Arrive on time and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellant quality - JUST AS OR BETTER THEN BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this in my office, glad I found it
customer_reviews.author: Kimber 1234

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Arrived with missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This cheaply made box arrived with the top unattached and no screws included to effect a repair. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DFGH

customer_reviews.title: just as it looks
customer_reviews.text: nice quality, top lifts to place tissue box. Can hold biggest box of tissue. Fun piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Unhinged
customer_reviews.text: It looks like books, so that's as advertised. Mine came with a broken hinge. Glad I just ordered one. If happy with it, i was gonna get 5 or 6 more.
customer_reviews.author: William W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and very well made. I was a bit hesitant because of the negative reviews but it’s more beautiful than in the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: VivianE

customer_reviews.title: It is not elegant looking - cheap looking painted plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not elegant looking - cheap looking painted plastic. Get what you pay for. Mine arrived with the hinge broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Blends in well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a book lover, so this blends well with my collection while making my tissue box look less out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: L
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in the unique gift section and just had to have it. It is a very beautiful tissue holder. The look of the books is genuine. I love this tissue holder because I love books. It’s very unique.
customer_reviews.author: MB Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Very classic look
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks. It is beautiful. The small hinches come very loose I repair both of them and put crazy glue.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Needed to be glued
customer_reviews.text: One set of screws wouldn't stay in so I had to hot glue it, but this is wicked cute so I can give that a pass
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive box to hold tissues. Completely satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daile

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and the recipient loved it. It isn't super-durable, but it looks great sitting on a shelf and the price wasn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item on my desk
customer_reviews.text: Turning something as simple as tissue into a commentable piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Harry Potter decor in my spare bedroom. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Book Lover with a Cold
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I keep it on my side table by the couch. I've already gotten compliments. It fits perfectly with all of my bookshelves.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tissue holder and matched my HP themed office! :)
customer_reviews.author: RRM

customer_reviews.title: This Antique Book Tissue Container is more beautiful than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This Antique Book Tissue Container is more beautiful than the picture! I bought it to put in our conference room at work to help disguise the unattractive tissue box that was there and to my surprise everyone wanted to take it home. I will remember this item for a future unique gift. I would give it two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Streets

product_meta.title: Tosnail Elegant Wooden Antique Book Tissue Holder Dispenser/Novelty Napkin Holder
feature_bullets: Perfect decoration in your room, car or office; Space for one box of tissues or for storage of other small items.
Top opens smoothly for convenient and easy removing or adding of tissues to the box cover.
Handmade and hand-painted to resemble a stack of antique books
Material: Wooden; The other side of the tissue holder has the gold edges of the books.
Approximate Dimensions: 4" H x 10-3/4" L x 6.5" W.
